name: Fox Bud
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

 Select desired controls from CONTROL menu.

If using KEYBOARD:  Move with WASD or ARROW KEYS

W: JUMP

SPACEBAR: Hold to RUN

__________

If using GAMEPAD:

A: JUMP

X: Hold to RUN

__________

I know, I know. Someone used this graphics pack already!  :(

I had not noticed until I was half way done with the game. Regardless it is not the graphic art (even though it is beautiful) that is meant to be the focus of this upload; it's the game. 

I hope you enjoy the feel of it and that you also enjoy the game design itself. It is my first upload and my first finished game project. I polished it the best I could. and to the best of my abilities. I can only get better with time! I will also be uploading it to my first game jam here on itch.io.

This is the type of games that I love to play and would love to make. No need for all that "extra" tedious junk from nowadays. There are TOO many games that are a jack of all trades but master of none. With me it's all about the FUN and SOLID mechanics!

 I am a huge platformer fan since my kid days playing Super Mario World on the SNES. Which is my inspiration along with the inspiration and guidance of Jerementor. Thank you Jerementor.

If you enjoyed this please donate and support me so that I can continue to make these kind of games (in a larger scale)!  I would love to develop video games for a living and eventually with some support I'd love to develop something real nice for you guys! 

Thank you for playing! Thank you for reading!
